name: Hungry Little Bear Lite
description:
A little bear named Bobby has a dream. He wants to make a fruit soup. Help the little bear to have a bite and to collect all ingredients for the fruit soup. Use the elements of the environment to achieve your goal. Be careful and do not eat the chilli peppers – they are very hot. Watch the fruits attentively, otherwise they can be eaten by hungry pigs. Collect the stars to earn more points. Good luck!

Only 16 levels are available in the Free version of the game.
